str2: No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle - 1st Person Singular
str2: A primary verb; to stop, i.e. Restrain, quit, desist, come to an end.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From eucharistos; to be grateful, i.e. to express gratitude; specially, to say grace at a meal.
Gen: in behalf of; acc: above.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Remembrance, recollection, mention; commemoration. From mnaomai or mimnesko; recollection; by implication, recital.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
From proseuchomai; prayer; by implication, an oratory.
